title: Letterpress Website
content:
Does anyone know of a good website that has visual examples of letterpress design?

/M\

 [‹ Room deco](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012215803/http:/typophile.com/node/19537 "Go to previous forum topic") [Stroke weights - should I really be messing with the natural order? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012215803/http:/typophile.com/node/19545 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Ispybri

comments.content: Not sure he has a website, but look at Alan Kitching.

We’ve recently constructed a parallel photo site at flickr for PPLetterpress

[http://www.flickr.com/groups/ppletterpress/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012215803/http:/www.flickr.com/groups/ppletterpress/ "http://www.flickr.com/groups/ppletterpress/")

Letterpress, all day, all the time.

Gerald

The Bieler Press  
 [http://BielerPress.blogspot.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012215803/http:/bielerpress.blogspot.com/ "http://BielerPress.blogspot.com")  
 [http://groups.yahoo.com/group/PPLetterpress](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012215803/http:/groups.yahoo.com/group/PPLetterpress "http://groups.yahoo.com/group/PPLetterpress")

Some of my fav sites...

[www.hatchshowprint.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012215803/http:/www.hatchshowprint.com/ "www.hatchshowprint.com")  
 [www.sesameletterpress.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012215803/http:/www.sesameletterpress.com/ "www.sesameletterpress.com")  
 [www.fiveroses.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012215803/http:/www.fiveroses.org/ "www.fiveroses.org")  
 [www.papercupdesign.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012215803/http:/www.papercupdesign.com/ "www.papercupdesign.com")  
papermonkeypress.com  
port2port.visualblogging.com
Starshaped.com has some really nice posters for sale. Can’t see much else costing $10 looking as good hung in my flat.
